TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawToolTipEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件類別時繪製和屬性值是`true`。The event is raised by the class when the is drawn and the property value is `true`. 此事件處理常式會接收的參數類型。The handler for this event receives a parameter of type . 類別包含需要繪製的所有資訊，包括文字，和繪圖應該完成的物件。The class contains all the information needed to paint the , including the text, the , and the object on which the drawing should be done. 若要自訂工具提示的查詢，使用來決定的工具提示中，界限和物件來執行自訂的繪圖。To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the object to perform your customized drawing. 您可以增加的界限處理顯示之前事件。You can increase the bounds of the before it is shown by handling the event. 也支援透過部分自訂，和方法。 also supports partial customization through the , and methods. 這些方法，您可以使用工具提示的主控描繪部分留給繪製，以標準方式的其他部分。Using these methods, you can owner draw portions of the ToolTip while leaving the other portions drawn in the standard way. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂繪製。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 此範例會建立並關聯到三控制項位於。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 範例會設定屬性為 true，且控制代碼事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件處理常式，是自訂按鈕，根據以不同的方式繪製會顯示由屬性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式使用`graphics`， `associatedControl`， `associatedWindow`， `bounds`，`font`和`toolTipText`同樣的具名參數初始化及其對應的屬性。The constructor uses the `graphics`, `associatedControl`, `associatedWindow`, `bounds`, `font` and `toolTipText` parameters to initialize their corresponding, similarly named properties. `backColor`和`foreColor`參數由和方法，分別。The `backColor` and `foreColor` parameters are used by the and methods, respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為可以透過多個控制項相關聯方法，屬性可以用來判斷哪一個控制項事件相關聯。Because the can be associated with multiple controls through the method, the property can be used to determine which control the event is associated with. 這是有幫助，如果您想要執行不同的工具提示自訂相關聯的控制項為基礎。This is helpful if you want to perform different ToolTip customization based on the associated control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂繪製。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 此範例會建立並關聯到三控制項位於。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 範例會設定屬性`true`並處理事件。The example sets the property to `true` and handles the event. 在事件處理常式，是自訂按鈕，根據以不同的方式繪製會顯示由屬性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下列程式碼摘錄示範如何使用範例屬性。The following code example excerpt demonstrates how to use the property. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssociatedWindow As IWin32Window
public: property System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ AssociatedWindow { System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得此 所繫結的視窗。

span.span: Gets the window to which this is bound.
The window which owns the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當視窗由另一個視窗中所擁有時，擁有的視窗是最小化，以主控視窗。When a window is owned by another window, the owned window is minimized and closed with the owner window. 擁有的 windows 也永遠不會顯示其主控表單後面。Owned windows are also never displayed behind their owner form. 這裡所代表之原生 Win32 視窗所擁有的工具提示屬性。Here the ToolTip is owned by the native Win32 window represented by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolTip1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolTip1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 使用系統的文字色彩和字型來繪製 的文字。

span.span: Draws the text of the using the system text color and font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示的預設方法顯示。The method represents the default method of displaying a . 系統指定的字型和目前的值，這個方法會使用的字型色彩。This method uses the system specified font and the current value of for the font color. 以單行中水平及垂直置中所指定的矩形繪製文字屬性; 它相當於下列呼叫的多載版本:The text is drawn as a single line centered horizontally and vertically within the rectangle specified by the property; it is equivalent to the following call to the overloaded version of : `DrawText(TextFormatFlags.HorizontalCenter | TextFormatFlags.VerticalCenter | TextFormatFlags.SingleLine | TextFormatFlags.HidePrefix)` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂繪製。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 此範例會建立並關聯到三控制項位於。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 範例會設定屬性為 true，且控制代碼事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件處理常式，是自訂按鈕，根據以不同的方式繪製會顯示由屬性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下列程式碼摘錄示範如何使用， ，和方法。The code excerpt below demonstrates using the , , and methods. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. summary.span: 取得用來繪製 的圖形介面。

The on which to draw the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用物件自訂的某些視覺外觀的繪圖。You use the object to customize the drawing of certain visual aspects of a . 例如，您可以繪製工具提示背景使用方法。For example, you can draw your own ToolTip background by using the method. 所指定的矩形之外進行繪製的任何自訂屬性不會顯示。Any custom drawing that is done outside of the rectangle specified by the property will not show up. 您可以增加的界限處理顯示之前`ToolTip.Popup`事件。You can increase the bounds of the before it is shown by handling the `ToolTip.Popup` event. 類別也提供，和方法來繪製的各個部分作業系統所使用的標準方式。The class also provides the , and methods to draw individual parts of the in the standard way used by the operating system. 您可以使用這些方法，並搭配物件方法，來進行時自訂其他部分的標準，您的工具提示的某些部分。You can use these methods, together with the object methods, to make some parts of your ToolTip standard, while customizing other parts. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂繪製。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 此範例會建立並關聯到三控制項位於。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 範例會設定屬性為 true，且控制代碼事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件處理常式，是自訂按鈕，根據以不同的方式繪製會顯示由屬性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下列程式碼摘錄示範如何使用和方法和使用屬性。The code excerpt below demonstrates using the and methods and using the property. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常會使用屬性來判斷什麼的工具提示文字是當您自訂繪製您的工具提示。Typically you would use the property to determine what the ToolTip text is when you are custom drawing your ToolTip. 您可以使用方法，以自訂的工具提示文字的繪圖。You can use the method to customize the drawing of the ToolTip text. 如果您想要有工具提示文字，使用指定的系統繪製樣式，請使用方法。If you want to have the ToolTip text drawn using the system specified style, use the method. 文字值傳遞給的值是來自方法類別。The text value comes from the value passed to the method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂繪製。The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the . 此範例會建立並關聯到三控制項位於。The example creates a and associates it to three controls located on the . 範例會設定屬性為 true，且控制代碼事件。The example sets the property to true and handles the event. 在事件處理常式，是自訂按鈕，根據以不同的方式繪製會顯示由屬性。In the event handler, the is custom drawn differently depending on what button the is being displayed for as indicated by the property. 下列程式碼摘錄示範如何使用方法與使用， ，和屬性。The code excerpt below demonstrates using the method and using the , , and properties. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw/VB/form1.vb#3)]
